issue.title: Not possible to change the pose of heightmaps

content.raw:
There's one bit of nuance I would add: the ODE heightmap collisions currently respect the rotation of the pose element, but they ignore the translation (try loading the world with the following patch and see the boxes fall because they miss the corners):

~~~
diff -r db9dd0b2eca3 worlds/heightmap.world
--- a/worlds/heightmap.world	Thu Mar 09 15:40:14 2017 -0800
+++ b/worlds/heightmap.world	Thu Mar 16 14:22:11 2017 -0700
@@ -94,9 +94,12 @@
       </link>
     </model>
     <model name="heightmap">
+      <pose>0 0 0  0 0 0</pose>
       <static>true</static>
       <link name="link">
+        <pose>0 0 0  0 0 0</pose>
         <collision name="collision">
+          <pose>0 0 0  0 0 0.7</pose>
           <geometry>
             <heightmap>
               <uri>file://media/materials/textures/heightmap_bowl.png</uri>
~~~

The rendering ignores both translation and rotation.
